content: <rdf:RDF xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:owl="http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:dcat="http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#" xmlns:dct="http://purl.org/dc/terms/">   <dcat:Dataset rdf:about="http://catalog.data.gov/dataset/national-child-abuse-and-neglect-data-system-child-file">     <owl:sameAs rdf:resource="urn:uuid:5fda0081-4f1f-4309-9b3a-dd47e6b4ba04"></owl:sameAs>     <dct:description>The Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act (Public Law 93-247), as amended, directed the Secretary of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (DHHS) to establish a national data collection and analysis program on child abuse and neglect. In response, DHHS established the National Child Abuse and Neglect Data System (NCANDS) as a voluntary national reporting system for the states. The Children\ufffd\ufffds Bureau in the Administration for Children & Families maintains the national data collection and analysis program. NCANDS represents an effort to develop and improve state and local child protective services (CPS) information systems, to implement a national child abuse and neglect data system, and to develop a data source able to respond to a wide range of policy and program analysis needs.</dct:description>         <dcat:keyword>age</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>county-of-residence</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>disposition</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>disposition-date</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>hispanic-ethnicity</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>living-arrangements</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>maltreatment-history</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>military-dependent-status</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>race</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>report-date</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>report-identification-number</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>report-source</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>sex</dcat:keyword>         <dcat:keyword>state</dcat:keyword>     <foaf:homepage rdf:resource="http://catalog.data.gov/dataset/national-child-abuse-and-neglect-data-system-child-file"></foaf:homepage>     <rdfs:label>national-child-abuse-and-neglect-data-system-child-file</rdfs:label>     <dct:identifier>national-child-abuse-and-neglect-data-system-child-file</dct:identifier>     <dct:title>National Child Abuse and Neglect Data System Child File</dct:title>         <dcat:distribution>             <dcat:Distribution>                 <dcat:accessURL rdf:resource="http://www.ndacan.cornell.edu/"></dcat:accessURL>                <dct:title>Web Page</dct:title>             </dcat:Distribution>         </dcat:distribution>     <dct:contributor>       <rdf:Description>         <foaf:name>John A.
